about_the_game:
ELDRIMAR is a blend of genres, Action/RPG/Adventure and Survival horror. The game tells a grim story in a dark fantasy setting.In the Kingdom of Eldrimar, a schism occurred, as necromancers rose up against the mages and took over the great city of Tier, destroying all living things and turning people into undead. The situation was seized upon by Lord Azator, the leader of the Alir race, who were once banished to lower worlds by humans long ago. The game's main character is Saron, a warrior of Azator, who has been trained since childhood for invasion. His task is to open the great portal and bring his people back to their homeland of Eldrimar. But it won't be easy as he is alone, and enemies are everywhere.

Dark and grim fantasy atmosphere
Melee combat
Crossbows
Magic
Leveling up
A well-thought-out system of enemy armor and damage
Puzzles
Diverse enemies

ELDRIMAR is the backstory of the Eternal Evil universe:

You can start with any game. ELDRIMAR - past times in a fantasy theme. Eternal Evil - our days.

Mature Content Description

This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

short_description: ELDRIMAR is a blend of genres, Action/RPG/Adventure and Survival horror. The game tells a grim story in a dark fantasy setting. Explore large, nonlinear locations, while eradicating the undead to progress through the fascinating storyline of the dark Kingdom of Eldrimar.
